Redding.University Preparatory School (Redding,:
University Preparatory School is a grade 6-12 college preparatory school located in Redding, California, United States established in 2004. The school is a charter school within the Shasta Union High School District.
Located in the Shasta Learning Center, the school's facilities include the use of three gymnasiums, a stadium with an all-weather turf field, softball and baseball fields, and 1000-seat theater.
